text: Dora Doll (19 May 1922 â€“ 15 November 2015) was a French actress. She was born Dorothea Hermina Feinberg in Berlin. She was known for her roles in Manon, French Cancan and in Julia. Doll died in Gard, France from complications of Alzheimer's disease, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Dora Doll has died; accessed 17 November 2015.
